Yachting Holiday Bracelet
kDesc
You've already spent all that money on a trip to sunny climes. May as well treat yourself to this too! [#Legal]
Vous avez dépensé tout cet argent pour vous trouver dans cette région ensoleillée. Pourquoi ne pas vous faire plaisir une fois de plus ! [#Legal]
Du hast schon so viel Geld für deine Reise in wärmere Breiten ausgegeben. Da kannst du dir diesen Armreif auch noch leisten! [#Legal]
Se hai già speso tutti quei soldi per un viaggio in un paese dove il sole bacia la pelle, puoi permetterti anche questo! [#Legal]
Ya te has gastado un dineral en un viaje a climas cálidos, por un poquito más… [#Legal]
旅行にそれだけお金を使うなら、ついでにこれを自分にプレゼントをしてもあまり変わらないよ！ [#Legal]
햇볕 쨍쨍한 여기까지 오는데 돈을 아끼지 않았죠. 이제 이것이라고 아낄 필요는 없지요! [#Legal]
You've already spent all that money on a trip to sunny climes. May as well treat yourself to this too! [#Legal]
反正都花那麼多錢去熱帶旅遊了，多買這個犒賞自己也沒差！ [#Legal]
反正都花那麼多錢去熱帶旅遊了，多買這個犒賞自己也沒差！ [#Legal]
You've already spent all that money on a trip to sunny climes. May as well treat yourself to this too! [#Legal]
